title: China’s Metaverse Is All About Work
description: The government wants the metaverse to be less about having fun and shopping and more about health care and industry.

title: The Internet That Tucker Carlson Built
description: The former Fox News host didn’t just fuel far-right politics in the US. His rants have fed conspiracy theorists and extremists all over the world.

title: Ford Jump Starts Its Attempt to Revive Detroit
description: The first phase of the automaker's redevelopment of the historic Michigan Central station is aimed at bringing more tech workers to the city—and to Ford.
